name: Biditech Solutions
tag_list: digital-signage-systems, yahoo-connectedtv-widgets-development, iptv, outsourcing, offshore-software-development, website-designing, database-development, software-maintenance, erp-system-development
overview:
Biditech Solutions is a global IT-Outsourcing and Offshore Software Development company with expertize in hot and new technologies like Digital Signage Systems, IPTV, Video Streaming Technology, Yahoo Connected TV Widgets.

A lab encouraging innovative thinking, smart logic and designs, incorporating innovative ideas into development of smart and cutting edge technology-enabled business solutions across all domains. Expertise in latest and hot technologies that are gripping the world like Digital Signage Systems, Video Streaming and IPTV Solutions, Widget Development for TV and OS, Mobile App Development.

A global outsourcing and offshore software development lab with a solid infrastructure and team, with a prime objective of customer satisfaction. Whether its development or maintenance, Biditech is one “stop-shop” for all your IT related needs.

Biditech has a mission of Encouraging innovation to fulfill our objectives, while creating a ego-less, cohesive and friendly environment, courtesy towards clients, employees and the society at large.

milestones.description:
Biditech expertize in the Development of Custom ERP System Development, ensuring data flow within the departments in a smooth and orderly fashion.

We also provide information visibility in terms of Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and dashboard report

Biditech designed, developed and deployed its complete B2B Application website for one of its U.A.E Clients, which is an Engineering Consultancy firm. The website Contains world class functionalities suitable for businesses in an Engineering Consultancy.
